Reviews.Title: “Amazing Staff & Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: Hadwa
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel finest hotels ive staff super friendly receptionist extremely helpful staff couldnt clean loved citys view istanbul top breakfast nice close taksim metro istiklal street easily totally recommend hotel friends enjoy stay istanbul

Reviews.Title: “poor insulation, mold in bathroom”
Reviews.Author: gonca-melih
Reviews.Content: average hotel noted 3 hotel insulation poor hotel street actively voices mold bathroom third heater didnt properly food standard special

Reviews.Title: “great value for money”
Reviews.Author: grevageo
Reviews.Content: hotel centraly located pedestrian road 50m taksim square clean average decoration fine cost fast internet free breakfast decent special location walk real feeling city traditional trendy restaurants bars cafe shops walking distance close taxi sightseeing staff friendly helpful speak english highly recomend value money solution

HotelInfo.Name: SV Boutique Hotel
